message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $160. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I understand that the product is valuable to you, but I'm still looking to save some money. How about we try $130? That's as high as I'm willing to go.
